Asylum, remand; custody and non-detained teams provide specialist service to these key cohorts. A further 90 UKBA staff are embedded in prisons nationwide.'

The role is also responsible for the Customer Service Improvement Directorate (CSID). CSID ensures the Agency has an effective complaints management system and is responsible for the investigation of all serious misconduct complaints made by customers. The directorate leads on the delivery and reporting of the UKBAs customer strategy and its customer service performance.'

Name: N/D
Job/Team Function: 'The Director for Agency Records Management and Modernisation is responsible for facilitating the transition from paper-based casework operations to E2E electronic caseworking. This includes managing the design and delivery of a new corporate paper casework storage contract and the management of the UKBA file creation and data protection units.'

Name: N/D
Job Title: Immigration and Asylum Biometrics System Programme (IABS)
Job/Team Function: 'The IABS system will enable UKBA to completely modernise its ability to use biometrics to protect our borders. The new system is scheduled for delivery at the end of 2011 and will support the checking of biometric visas, registration cards for asylum seekers and biometric residence permits. IABS can also be expanded to cater for future immigration applications, for example streamlined border entry processes.'

Name: N/D
Job Title: Director of Strategy, Design and Change
Job/Team Function: 'Immigration Case Work Programme is responsible for strategy and policy for immigration case working; business and technical design of the Immigration Case Work system; business change and account management. The director for Strategy, Design and Change provides strategic design, direction and leadership to the Immigration Case Work programme.'

Name: 'Eliminated'
Job/Team Function: 'Responsible for operational delivery and Local Immigration Teams. A strategic role with responsibility for operational delivery. The North West Operations Director role combines responsibility for the delivery of high volume casework and enforcement functions. In particular, this role takes the lead on operational delivery in the following key areas; removals, nationality, asylum, income, and European casework. Change is managed to ensure that all operational functions work effectively together, achieving business outcomes and generating savings across corporate support units.'

Name: N/D
Job/Team Function: 'To develop and lead the delivery of effective global risk and intelligence and international liaison network within International Group, which protects the security of the border, thus reducing harm to the UK by gathering, evaluating and disseminating intelligence on overseas threats; enhancing visa decision quality through the provision of dynamic risk profiles; reducing irregular movements of migrants; and tackling criminal enterprises.'

Name: N/D
Job/Team Function: 'The People and Organisational Development Directorate (PODD) helps the UKBA Board and the various business areas within the Agency, to develop the design, capability and culture of the Agency. The PODDs responsibilities include talent and performance management, management training and development and working with the different parts of the Agency to directly support their change programmes through process improvement and re-design.'
